references: Amends: Ord 106075; Related: CF 284220, CF 284272, CF 284271, Res 25149
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Capital Improvement Program during 1977; amending Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance 106075 to authorize the City Engineer, under the direction of the Board of Public Works, and the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation, to hire certain expert services, where required; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
